bio:
Hello,

Thanks for visiting my profile. I am Hassan, Amazon market expert with rich experience of the field. Amazon Certified Service Provider, Amazon Sales Strategy Expert & Certified Sponsor Ads Manager, Having Knowledge of all Amazon Terms & Conditions for Every Category's Product Sellers.

3+ Years of Amazon market Experience, Expediter in Amazon FBA product research, Amazon PPC, Enhanced Brand Content, Product Listing & Optimization & Social Media Marketing & Promotions.

The list of AMAZON account services I can handle are as follow -
- Amazon seller account management on Seller Central, Vendor Central & Express
- Catalogue and inventory management
- FBA Product Research ( Private Label)
- Competitor analysis
- Amazon Web Scraping
- Amazon FBA A-Z Consultancy

- PPC Ads Performance Monitoring.
- Product Launching & Ranking
- Social media marketing & Promotions
- Product traffic increasing plans
- Free Launching Plan & Ranking Strategy
- Customer Support

I have following premium tools for Amazon FBA Business:

1. Jungle scout
2. Helium 10
3. Merchant word
4. Viral launch

I always like to do a report base and organized work. That's why I will provide you:
* Product Research Reports.
* Competitors Reports.
* Product Validation Reports.
* Keywords Research Report.



I always aim to maintain long-term projects. You can hire me if you are in seek of someone who can help you to grow your business on an e-commerce platform, so you can invest your more time in expanding an existing business or starting a new business.

Feel free to text me. thanks

abstrac: We provide Bookkeeping and Accounting, Data Analytics & Business Intelligence, Digital Marketing and Graphic Designing Services.
bio:
SMB Services is a California-based business process outsourcing firm with an offshore office in Pakistan. We provide Bookkeeping & Accounting, Data Analytics & Business Intelligence and Digital Marketing services for small and medium-sized businesses. We keep our costs competitive and the quality of our deliverables high while giving you the opportunity to focus on your core business.  
Our Financial Services team comprises of certified accountants, chartered management accounts with Pro Advisor - advance certifications and expertise in  Xero, Freshbooks, Wave, Myob & Sage , zoho, Also equipped with knowledge and application of US GAAP & California Taxes.
Our Data Analytics & Business Intelligence Services  team comprises of experts who can consolidate diverse structured and unstructured data sets to provide your business with actionable insights in real-time, and  provide solutions that can be scaled. This data can help unlock analytical insights into potential capabilities, risks, and growth opportunities.  our team having expertise in reporting tools: Power BI, Tableau, Microsoft Excel, Google Data Studio, Google Analytics. Software compatibility: Studio, Tableau, Power BI, Python, SQL
Our vibrant Digital Marketing team comprises of certified google experts, Content specialists, Social media specialists, SEO specialists, Graphic Designers, Web Developers, PPC specialists and Strategists. Our expertise is not limited to Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn. We keep exploring new platforms to enhance brand reach and goals.
SMB Services has significant experience working with data across multiple sectors such as finance, asset management, architecture, property management, construction industry, retail, real estate and tech.
At SMB Services  security of the client data is prioritized, we value confidentiality and integrity of the information. Therefore, we have dedicated provisions of services according to a mutually-agreed timeline.

porfolio.title: Motion Graphic Designer 3D Animation And Video Editor

bio:
Hi!
My name is Haris and I'm an animator, video editor, and motion graphic designer. I have much experience in the field of motion graphics, video editing, video explaining, video production, and logo animations. I will produce a professional video animation, youtube video editing, video production, and explainer video for you guys. I deliver high quality product and exceptional service with every order!

About the project
I provide 100 % SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK to our buyers.

*** PLEASE CONTACT US BEFORE ORDERING ***



The Process:

Message Me – we will discuss your project & requirements & work out the best.


Provide Footage – Provide your required footage so that I can have a look and tell you the best outcome possible out of it.


Video Creation – When the magic happens, I’ll edit your footage into a video you will love, by adding our editing skills such as graphics or animations, music, SFX, audio enhancement, or color grade


Delivery – I will deliver your video to you in the format of your choice like MP4.MOV.MPEG etc.


I can do professional video editing and post-production on films can do promotional videos, short clips, music videos, commercials, intros, VFX, Green screen cleaning, etc.

Quite simply "Customer sanctification is our priority"



Important NOTE: Video editing is critical, so please contact me with your description of what you want, I am online
